text: TSG 1899 Hoffenheim is a German women's association football team from Hoffenheim in northern Baden-Württemberg. The team plays in the Frauen Bundesliga. The team plays their games at the Dietmar-Hopp-Stadion, which was used by the men's team until 2009. == Record == === Bundesliga === The club's first season in the Bundesliga was in 2013–14. title: TSG 1899 Hoffenheim (women)
